Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hello Ulf,

The configuration is reasonably well documented in the javadocs:
*
http://builds.archive.org/javadoc/heritrix-3.x-snapshot/org/archive/modules/forms/ExtractorHTMLForms.html
*
http://builds.archive.org/javadoc/heritrix-3.x-snapshot/org/archive/modules/forms/FormLoginProcessor.html

Hope this helps.

Noah



On Tue, Apr 8, 2014 at 3:52 AM, el Backo <e_backo@...> wrote:

>
>
> Hi
>
> Does anybody know how to use ExtractHTMLForms and FormLoginProcessor?
>
> Description how to use these beans in crawler-beans.cxml?
>
> Best regards
> Ulf
>
>
> 
>

--089e0158ab96be19ae04f68e17f7
